'''v0.15.1 alpha build 1''' is the first and only build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.15.1 alpha|v0.15.1]], which fixes some bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=0.15.1 Beta 1
|;From released versions before 0.15.0
|MCPE-11833|Top Snow Cannot Be Seen In Hand
|MCPE-12281|Enchantment Table, Furnace, Brewing Stand, Dropper, Hopper, and Dispenser do not change their name when renaming it with an anvil
|MCPE-12540|Hopper texture bug
|MCPE-13325|dyed leather armor in dispenser changes to regular leather armor when the dispenser is broken
|MCPE-14303|No Damage Taken When Standing On Cactus
|;From the 0.15.0 development versions
|MCPE-14521|Undead/Passive mobs still alive when get hit by tipped arrows of healing/harming
}}</onlyinclude>
